title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.12 - Requirements concerning demolition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.12 - Requirements concerning demolition

State Regulations

In addition to responding in accordance with section
753-4.6
(a) of
this Subpart, the operator shall attend a pre-demolition conference with the
excavator upon the excavators request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-4.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
